title: Careers Fair and Careers Roundup
desc: We invite a limited set of major sponsors and community partners (accelerators, nonprofits, VCs) in a careers fair at the start of the event to promote internship and graduate opportunities and to help students discover new career paths they might have been unaware of.

title: Mentoring Sessions and Interviews
desc: We invite mentors and guests from your company to get involved to help students and give valuable advice that would help students well after their academic careers.

title: Branding on UNIHACK
desc: Take your brand to the next level with UNIHACK with:
listItems: Logos and content on the website and UNIHACK in-event collateral
Opportunities through our social media and newsletter that reach competitors and university students alike
In-Event Promotions by sending mentors or providing giveaways

title: Company Giveaways
desc: Weâ€™ll distribute your company swag, APIs and tooling to teams before and during the event.

title: API and Tools Roundup
desc: Closer to the event, we generate campaigns around software, hardware or various tools provided by companies. Promote to our 200+ competitors and get them to adopt company-sponsored software or hardware.
